title: Print/letterhead, "Letterhead for Robert Lee"
markings: Marks: Strathmore script/100% cotton fiber USA
inscribed: Imprinted in black ink at upper left: ROBERT LEE BLAFFER TRUST; at upper right: New Harmony, Indiana. At lower left imprinted in two columns: TRUSTEES/DON BLAIR, Chairman/P.O.Box 546, New Harmony, Indiana/PHILIP JOHNSON, Vice Chairman/375 Park Avenue, New York 22, N.Y./ORA V. HOWTON, Secretary - Treasurer/521 Texas National Bldg., Houston 2, Texas/HELEN DUPREY BULLOCK, Historian/2000 K Street N.W., Washington D.C./The SISTER ELISE C.H.S./62 W. 113 Street, New York 25, N.Y.
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff

tombstone.epitaph:
Print/letterhead, "Letterhead for Robert Lee".
Support: white wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-104-1.
